Praising your children,"Hi! I just wanted to thank you for making this commitment to improve the life of your children. It shows you really care!
column3: Today's Parenting Tip is all about Praise. How did the above message make you feel? We all appreciate it when the good things we do are recognised by others, especially when it is someone who is close to us.
column4: Praise your children when they are behaving well! They may not show it but you’ll see them doing that good behaviour again…","image:https://idems-media-recorder.web.app/storage/project/PLH/subproject/Rapidpro/deployment/Global/resourceGroup/image/universal/you_deserve_a_star.jpg

column1: PLH - Content - Time - One on one time baby,skill
column2: One-on-one time,"Today's tip is about spending One-on-One Time with Our Children.
column3: Children learn through play! Here is a comic about spending one-on-one time with your baby!
column4: Parent: ""Such a strong baby you are.""

column2: Parent: ""We are making a delicious meal together.""
Parent: ""Wow! You have stacked 3 blocks on top of each other. Well done!""

Coping with crying,"The sound of a baby crying can be very distressing, especially for a parent. It is completely natural to want to make it stop. You might also think that you are not a good parent or that your baby is crying to spite you. But all babies cry. It is one of the main ways a baby can tell you that something is wrong.",,Would you like to learn more about this tip?,,We know that you have already received this tip (well done!). Would you like to review it again?,,"That's okay! You can always type ""Help"" at anytime if you need any support with your children. Chat to you later!",

column1: PLH - Content - Positive - Budget with children,skill
column2: Family budgeting,"Millions of families are struggling to make ends meet especially due to the COVID-19 pandemic. When money is tight, this can make us feel anxious, stressed, and sad. How we understand and talk about money with our children is important. Our children can also help us to spend and save in ways that will benefit the family.",,Would you like to learn more about this tip?,"image:@(fields.image_path & ""family_budgeting.jpg"")",We know that you have already received this tip (well done!). Would you like to review it again?,"image:@(fields.image_path & ""family_budgeting.jpg"")","That's okay! You can always type ""Help"" at anytime if you want this tip at another time. Chat to you later!",
